Package com.hedera.hashgraph.identity.hcs

Hedera Identity framework implementation based on Hedera Consensus Service DID method specification.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddressBook
    Appent's address book for HCS identity network.
    HcsIdentityNetwork
    Appnet's identity network based on Hedera HCS DID method specification.
    HcsIdentityNetworkBuilder
    The builder used to create new appnet identity networks based on Hedera HCS DID method specification.
    Message  
    MessageEnvelope<T extends Message>
    The envelope for Hedera identity messages sent to HCS DID or VC topics.
    MessageListener<T extends Message>
    A listener of confirmed messages from a HCS identity topic.
    MessageResolver<T extends Message>  
    MessageTransaction<T extends Message>  
    SerializableMirrorConsensusResponse
    This class is a serializable copy of the MirrorConsensusResponse class from the Java SDK.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    MessageMode
    The mode in which HCS message with DID document is submitted.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    InvalidMessageException
    Exception thrown when the message coming from the mirror node fails validation.
